Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-3576 affecting package krb5 for versions less than 1.19.4-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-3576 affecting package krb5 for versions less than 1.19.4-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package krb5 is earlier than 1.19.4-4, affected by CVE-2025-3576
